title: Les Noces du Bossu = the Wedding of the Hunchback
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Paul Feval.
description: Episode 4 of Series "Lagardere". Philippe de Gonzague is to introduce Flor alias Aurore to the Regent during a Royal Gala. This is also the setting chosen by Lagardere to reinstate Aurore in her rights.  Credits: Producer, Robert Velin ; director, Jean-Pierre Decourt ; writers, Marcel Jullian, Jean-Pierre Decourt ; photography, Georges Barsky ; music, Jacques Loussier. Cast: Jean Piat, Jacques Dufilho, Jean-Pierre Darras, Nadine Alari, Jacques Balutin, Claude Confortes, Marco Perrin, Dominique Paturel, Edmond Ardisson, Henri Attal, Raoul Billerey, Raymond Gerome, Michel Grellier, Dominique Zardi, Sacha Pitoeff.
